title: [덴마크, 영문안내] Industrial Sustainability 관련 연구 Fellowship 모집안내
author: 국제협력팀 정혜인
content:
KAIST 파트너 기관인 DTU(Technical University of Denmark)에서 온 모집안내 아래 전달드립니다.
    DTU has been working closely with the Eco-Industrial Cluster, GreenLab, in Skive, Denmark in developing a new Fellowship programme with a focus on Industrial Sustainability. The collaboration is between a Danish Research Foundation (VILLUM FONDEN), DTU and Aarhus Institute of Advanced Studies (AIAS). We are pleased to announce up to five joint theme-based fellowships for 22 months from September 2023 to July 2025.
 The GreenLab-Villum theme-based fellowships seek to enhance interdisciplinary and global collaboration by engaging an interdisciplinary and international group of excellent researchers in theme-based research projects within the scope of GreenLab.
 Researchers of any nationality and from all academic disciplines with research profiles within the thematic scope of the call. The programme's target group is talented researchers at all career stages with minimum a PhD at the time of the application deadline.
 Examples of research topics for fellows under the thematic mission:
Digital solutions for control and optimization of hybrid energy to industrial production and storage, as well as new market mechanisms
New models for Socioeconomic value, new capitalism, circular economy, and equilibrium models for circular industrial cluster design
Economic modelling of integrated energy infrastructure in cluster development
 Application deadline is on the 16th of May 2023. 
You can find more information here: https://www.greenlab.dk/rd/open-research-calls/
